DOC.brief_summary: This study focus maintenance weight loss achieve 2007 Shape-Up Rhode Island ( SURI ) program . We plan recruit 180 individual participate SURI lose least 10 pound take part 4-month weight loss maintenance program SURI end . Participants randomly assign one three group : Education , Increased Exercise , Daily Self-Weighing .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Maintenance Study 2007 Shape UP RI Participants
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are 18 year old 2 . Lost 10 pound 2007 Shape Up RI program 3 . Want learn skill maintain weight loss 4 . Can come Weight Control Diabetes Research Center locate 196 Richmond Street `` The Jewelry District '' Providence baseline assessment visit midMay/midJune final assessment visit midOctober . 5 . Agree randomly assign ( mean choose ) one three weight loss maintenance intervention : General Education , Increased Physical Activity , SelfRegulation 6 . Available take part six 30minute conference call either Monday , Tuesday Thursday start noon 12:30pm . You give tollfree callin number call location . The call would weekly 4 week start June , would one call midAugust one midSeptember . 1 . Not 18 year old . 2 . Did participate 2007 Shape UP RI program 3 . Participated 2007 Shape Up RI lose less 10 pound program . 4 . Currently plan become pregnant next 4 month . 5 . Currently participate another weight loss exercise study . 6 . Not available take part six 30minute conference call either Monday , Tuesday Thursday start noon 12:30pm . The call would weekly 4 week start June , would one call midAugust one midSeptember .
